Text:
think your mixing up the extensions with the format

xvids=h263 and uncompressed av is avi

h264 = mp4

not that is matters as the players generally go by header info to decode

psspss: avi is just a container. it does not tell you if its compressed or not. the only important thing is the codec.

yeah, back in 90's, AVI used to be an uncompressed audio video.
